name: Gmail Send Message
description: Sends a new email via the Gmail account.

inputs.name: to
inputs.description: Recipient email address(es), comma-separated for multiple recipients

inputs.name: cc
inputs.description: CC recipient email address(es), comma-separated for multiple recipients

inputs.name: bcc
inputs.description: BCC recipient email address(es), comma-separated for multiple recipients

inputs.name: contentType
inputs.description: Content type of the email body (text/plain or text/html)

inputs.name: attachments
inputs.description: File paths of attachments, comma-separated for multiple files
